name: Monstera Deliciosa
description: A popular and easy-to-care-for houseplant with iconic split leaves. It thrives in bright, indirect light and adds a tropical vibe to any room.

name: Snake Plant
description: Known for its upright sword-like leaves, this plant tolerates low light and infrequent watering. A perfect choice for beginners.

name: Peace Lily
description: This elegant plant produces white blooms and thrives in low light. It also helps purify the air, making it a favorite for homes and offices.

name: Aloe Vera
description: A succulent with thick, healing leaves often used for skincare. It needs bright sunlight and minimal watering to thrive.

name: Fiddle Leaf Fig
description: With its large violin-shaped leaves, this plant makes a bold statement. It requires consistent care and plenty of indirect light.

name: Jade Plant
description: A symbol of good luck and prosperity, jade plants have thick, glossy leaves. They are drought-tolerant and love bright light.

name: Spider Plant
description: This fast-growing plant is known for its arching green-and-white leaves. It produces baby offshoots that can be easily propagated.

name: Boston Fern
description: With lush feathery fronds, Boston ferns add greenery to any space. They prefer humid environments and indirect sunlight.

name: ZZ Plant
description: The ZZ plant is almost indestructible, tolerating low light and neglect. Its shiny, dark green leaves bring elegance indoors.

name: Rubber Plant
description: A classic indoor plant with large glossy leaves. It needs bright, indirect light and occasional pruning to maintain shape.

name: Calathea Orbifolia
description: Admired for its striking patterned leaves, Calathea Orbifolia thrives in humidity. It adds a tropical touch to modern interiors.

name: Bird of Paradise
description: With bold banana-like leaves, this plant grows tall and dramatic. It can also produce striking bird-shaped flowers in the right conditions.
